tool_description: Unlimited and Targeted Music Discovery.  Get personal recommendations, enjoy unlimited mixtapes, discover new artists, and much more!  Our API lets you search for, discover and explore music entities and their connections.
name: Seevl
title: Seevl

api_list.name: Get related entities

optional_parameters.name: _lang
optional_parameters.description: Lang for results. Uses english if nothing is found for the given lang. Default: en

api_list.name: Entity Search
api_list.description: Search for an entity by prefLabel, i.e. its name. OR Search for an entity by key=value patterns. Values are entity IDs, and can be identified with the previous prefLabel search method.

optional_parameters.name: _lang
optional_parameters.description: Lang for matchin and results. Uses english if nothing is found for the given lang. Default: en

optional_parameters.name: key
optional_parameters.description: string, required example: genre  Possible values: genre instrument label origin member.artist member.groupstring, required example: BntvuZAy

api_list.name: Get entity basic infos
api_list.description: Get entity basic infos (prefLabel, description, type). Description is from Wikipedia, you must display its source and licence when using it in your application.

optional_parameters.name: _lang
optional_parameters.description: Lang for results. Uses english if nothing is found for the given lang. Default: en

api_list.name: Get entity fact-sheet
api_list.description: Get entity fact-sheet, including genre, label, influences, etc. for artists Fact-sheet is using a key-value model with keys including (depending on the entity type): * genre - musical genre (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * label - record label (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * origin - artist origin (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * membership.group - groups the artist is member of (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * membership.artist - group members (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * collaborated_with - artist collaborations (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * birth.place - birth place (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * birth.date - birth date (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * death.place - death place (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * death.date - death date (for Artist, SoloArtist, Group) * broader - paren genres (for Genre) * narrower - child genres (for Genre)

optional_parameters.name: _lang
optional_parameters.description: Lang for results. Uses english if nothing is found for the given lang. Default: en

api_list.name: Get entity links
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seevl.p.rapidapi.com/entities/RkMQZrfG/links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seevl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://seevl.p.rapidapi.com/entities/{id}/links"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seevl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get relations between entities
api_list.description: Get relations between entities. This method is only available for entities of type Artist (and its sub-types Solo and Group)

optional_parameters.name: _lang
optional_parameters.description: Lang for results. Uses english if nothing is found for the given lang. Default: en
